title: AbstractColumnBasedTable
description: The ColumnBasedTable is a set of columns, which have equal length (data.ColumnSize) included by types carrying embedded table properties. Columns have a Property Kind, UnitOfMeasure and Facet. There are KeyColumns (index columns) and Columns (for look-up values). Examples are KrPc, PVT and Facies tables.

KeyColumns.title: Key columns
KeyColumns.description: A column whose values are considered as keys/indices. Do not use this attribute if you want to follow a given ColumnBasedTableType.

Columns.title: Common columns
Columns.description: A common column storing values of a particular property kind. Do not use this attribute if you want to follow a given ColumnBasedTableType.

ColumnSize.title: Size of columns
ColumnSize.description: The count of elements in each column

ColumnValues.title: The values of each column
ColumnValues.description:
First column values are related to first key column, second column values are related to the second key column, etc…
Column values at index KeyColumns count are related to first (non key) column, Column values at index KeyColumns count + 1 are related to second (non key) column, etc...

items.title: ColumnValues
items.description: Value of the column. Generally only one of the attribute should be instantiated.

BooleanColumn.title: Boolean Column
BooleanColumn.description: A column of only boolean values

IntegerColumn.title: Integer Column
IntegerColumn.description: A column of only integer values

NumberColumn.title: Number Column
NumberColumn.description: A column of only number values

StringColumn.title: String Column
StringColumn.description: A column of only string values

UndefinedValueRows.title: Undefined value rows
UndefinedValueRows.description: The row indexes for which the values are flagged as undefined.

ColumnBasedTableType.title: The type of the column based table
ColumnBasedTableType.description: Quickly indicate the type of the column based table (KrPc, PVT, Facies, ...) and its standard columns definition. It is supposed to be used when you don't use KeyColumns neither Columns as attributes of this WPC.
